input_text:
Job Title: Sales - Virtual Hiring Event

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Business Development, Sales

Description:
Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT is a global leader in disaster restoration. From initial clean-up to complete rebuilds, Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT is there every step of the way. We work on multi-million dollar commercial projects as well as several thousand dollar residential losses and everything in between. Founded in 1948, we have a long-standing reputation as a leader in our industry.
We are a team built on high energy, high performing individuals who work together to maintain Blackmon Mooring as an industry leader.
SummaryWe are seeking talented individuals in sales and business development to join our team as Commercial Account Managers and Emergency Response Coordinators. We have locations across the US and are currently hiring in 16 cities! This event is a unique opportunity to schedule an interview with us immediately.
Markets: Anaheim, CA; Bryan/College Station, TX; Baltimore/Washington D.C.; Boston, MA; Chicago, IL; Denver, CO; Detroit, MI; Houston, TX; Miami, FL; Atlanta, GA; New Orleans, LA; NYC/New Jersey; Hayward, CA; Dallas/Forth, TX; Philadelphia, PA; and Raleigh, NC
Hiring Event:Monday- April 22nd 4pm - 7pm Central TimeWednesday- April 24th 4pm - 5pm Central Time
CompensationYou will receive a competitive base salary along with a lucrative incentive plan. Your compensation will vary by experience level. This can be discussed during the first interview. In addition, you will be provided with a company vehicle, fuel card, EZ pass/Toll Tag, lap-top, phone and all the tools you will need to assure success. We provide fully paid medical insurance for our employees, optional dental and vision insurance, a 401 (k) plan, generous paid time off and more.
If this sounds like a great opportunity for you, please APPLY TODAY and schedule to attend our HIRING EVENT!
You can text "BMSjobs" to 25000 and ask questions or start the process.
BMS CAT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Sales - Virtual Hiring Event
output_json.summary: Join Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT, a global leader in disaster restoration, as a Commercial Account Manager or Emergency Response Coordinator.
job_responsibilities: Joining Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT as part of their sales and business development team
Working in various locations across the US

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.
